title.value: CARIN RTPBC Example Reject Code System

description.value: This code system contains example NCPDP Reject Codes (511-FB codes set) to be used by real-time pharmacy benefit check servers when encountering a data or business rule error that prevents processing from completing. This is a placeholder to be replaced prior to publishing with a formal mechanism for referencing in FHIR.

display.value: Cardholder ID Matched But Last Name Did Not

definition.value: Cardholder ID Matched But Last Name Did Not

display.value: Coverage Outside Submitted Date Of Transaction

definition.value: Coverage Outside Submitted Date Of Transaction
